I see that JUnit @ SourceForge will not be supporting things like
IDE Integration, I am planning on covering this on junit.org.  Will
those sort of questions be welcome on the junit@sourceforge lists?

Can the support email (junit@...) be forwarded to those
lists as well?

--
Erik Meade             emeade@...
Senior Consultant      Object Mentor, Inc.
http://www.junit.org

> From: Ray Power

> To: junit@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] JUnit @ SourceForge
> 
> 
> I agree, a very good idea.
>
